scripts.deploy-prod: rm -rf generated && graph codegen ./subgraph-mainnet-production.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ $GRAPH_ENDPOINT ./subgraph-mainnet-production.yaml --access-token $GRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN
scripts.deploy-staging: rm -rf generated && graph codegen ./subgraph-kovan-staging.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ $KOVAN_ENDPOINT ./subgraph-kovan-staging.yaml --access-token $GRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN
